name: Introduction to Rocket Propulsion
description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion and rocket engines.

lessons.name: History of Rocketry
lessons.description: A brief history of rocketry and space exploration.

lessons.name: Rocket Engine Types
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket engines.

name: Fuel and Combustion
description: Understanding rocket fuel, combustion processes, and efficiency.

lessons.name: Rocket Fuel
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket fuels.

name: Nozzle Design
description: Principles of rocket nozzle design and performance optimization.

lessons.name: Nozzle Design
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket nozzles.

lessons.name: Nozzle Optimization
lessons.description: Optimizing nozzle design for specific applications.

name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics
description: Basic aerodynamic concepts and fluid dynamics principles.

lessons.name: Basic Principles of Fluid Mechanics
lessons.description: concepts of fluid mechanics, essential for understanding how air behaves around objects, especially wings.

lessons.name: Airfoil and Wing Aerodynamics
lessons.description: study of airfoils, which are the cross-sectional shapes of wings, and how they generate lift and drag

lessons.name: Boundary Layers and Flow Separation
lessons.description: concept of boundary layers, the thin region of air close to the surface of an airfoil, where viscous effects are significant

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

lessons.name: Fundamentals of Mach Number and Flow Regimes
lessons.description: Understand the Mach number and its significance in classifying flow regimes

lessons.name: Shock Waves and Expansion Fans in Supersonic Flow
lessons.description: Learn about the formation and impact of shock waves and expansion fans in supersonic flow

lessons.name: Aerodynamic Design for Subsonic vs. Supersonic Aircraft
lessons.description: Compare the aerodynamic design considerations for subsonic and supersonic aircraft

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

lessons.name: Basics of Aerodynamic Heating and Heat Transfer Mechanisms
lessons.description: Understand the concept of aerodynamic heating and the mechanisms of heat transfer in high-speed flows

lessons.name: Thermal Effects on Materials in High-Speed Aerodynamics
lessons.description: Explore how aerodynamic heating impacts materials and structural integrity in high-speed aerospace applications

lessons.name: Thermal Protection Systems
lessons.description: Understand the design and function of thermal protection systems to manage aerodynamic heating

name: Spacecraft Structural Design
description: Fundamentals of designing spacecraft structures and materials selection.

name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Understanding orbital dynamics and mission planning.

name: Spacecraft Systems Engineering
description: Overview of spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering.
